Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:41.06]I've been rollin' on the freeway
[00:43.63]I've been riding 85
[00:46.20]I've been thinking way too much
[00:48.83]And I'm way too gone to drive
[00:51.39]I got anger in my chest
[00:54.03]I got millions on my mind
[00:56.63]And you didn't fit the picture
[00:59.21]So I guess you weren't the vibe
[01:01.78]I've been rollin' on the freeway
[01:04.45]I've been riding 85
[01:06.95]I've been thinking way too much
[01:09.66]And I'm way too gone to drive
[01:12.21]I got anger in my chest
[01:14.82]I got millions on my mind
[01:17.41]And you didn't fit the picture
[01:20.12]So I guess you weren't the vibe
[01:22.62]
[01:23.37]L-O-V-E on my right leg, that's Gucci (know what I'm sayin'?)
[01:25.97]L-O-V-E on my main ho, that's pucci (get what I'm sayin'?)
[01:28.62]Caught a lil' jetlag but I'm golden, damn
[01:31.17]We deserve Grammys and some Oscars, damn
[01:33.88]They deserve wammys, they imposters
[01:36.15]I be rollin' with my project homies, it's a vibe
[01:39.06]I just did some pills with the homie, it's a vibe
[01:41.46]Bend her over, switch sides, it's a vibe
[01:43.37]
[01:44.33]I come through with strippers and some shottas
[01:46.91]I gotta accept that I'm a monster
[01:49.47]I pull up in several different options
[01:51.89]Not all, but most of 'em came topless
[01:54.23]I'll shatter your dreams with this cream I make
[01:56.81]Gotta be on codeine to think of shit I say
[01:59.91]I can't feel my toes and ain't gon' fold up
[02:02.56]I was in the parkin' lot when I rolled up
[02:04.52]
[02:04.53]I've been rollin' on the freeway
[02:07.12]I've been riding 85
[02:09.64]I've been thinking way too much
[02:12.31]And I'm way too gone to drive
[02:14.85]I got anger in my chest
[02:17.41]I got millions on my mind
[02:20.11]And you didn't fit the picture
[02:22.66]So I guess you weren't the vibe
[02:25.19]I've been rollin' on the freeway
[02:27.90]I've been riding 85
[02:30.53]I've been thinking way too much
[02:33.16]And I'm way too gone to drive
[02:35.69]I got anger in my chest
[02:38.30]I got millions on my mind
[02:40.90]And you didn't fit the picture
[02:43.50]So I guess you weren't the vibe
[02:46.07]
[02:46.16]Pluto
[02:47.05]Gotta dig what I'm sayin', Chanel draped on me, baby
[02:49.56]Gotta dig what I'm sayin', she look like she's sponsored by Mercedes
[02:52.33]Dig what I'm sayin', this cree cologne is on me, baby (you dig?)
[02:55.08]Dig what I'm sayin'? I'm goin' hard (hard, yeah)
[02:57.67]I pop up bubbly in your memory
[03:00.18]You should be glad I'm showin' you sympathy (show you sympathy)
[03:02.77]I gave you, took you up out the gutter (out the gutter)
[03:05.33]Ever let you go, you gon' suffer (you gon' suffer from it)
[03:07.80]
[03:07.81]I come through with strippers and some shottas
[03:10.38]I gotta accept that I'm a monster
[03:12.96]I pull up in several different options
[03:15.47]Not all, but most of 'em came topless
[03:17.85]I'll shatter your dreams with this cream I make
[03:20.31]Gotta be on codeine to think of shit I say
[03:23.44]I can't feel my toes and ain't gon' fold up
[03:26.02]I was in the parkin' lot when I rolled up
[03:27.93]
[03:32.35]Yeah, L.O.V.E. on my right leg
[03:44.66]Nah Hendrix overload, dig what I'm sayin'?
[03:49.08]I feel like I should be giving up
[03:54.66]You can't leave this, it's too much
[03:59.44]But I'm tired of you leading me on, oh no
[04:04.76]I don't like where this shit is going
[04:09.96]You heart is stuck in all your apologies
[04:15.55]Gave you all but you went off on me
[04:20.72]Keep your love, it doesn't feel the same
[04:25.73]I hope it hurts you when you're hearin' my name
